argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mpt2frlmd.f | |- F = ( R freeLMod ( N X. M ) ) |
| 2 |  | mpt2frlmd.v | |- V = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | mpt2frlmd.s | |- ( ( i = a /\ j = b ) -> A = B ) |
| 4 |  | mpt2frlmd.a | |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. M ) -> A e. X ) |
| 5 |  | mpt2frlmd.b | |- ( ( ph /\ a e. N /\ b e. M ) -> B e. Y ) |
| 6 |  | mpt2frlmd.e | |- ( ph -> ( N e. U /\ M e. W /\ Z e. V ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( N e. U /\ M e. W ) -> ( N X. M ) e. _V ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( N e. U /\ M e. W /\ Z e. V ) -> ( N X. M ) e. _V ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( N X. M ) e. _V ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_simp3d | |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_jca | |- ( ph -> ( ( N X. M ) e. _V /\ Z e. V ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 13 | 1, 12, 2 | #P_frlmbasf | |- ( ( ( N X. M ) e. _V /\ Z e. V ) -> Z : ( N X. M ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( Z : ( N X. M ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> Z Fn ( N X. M ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 13, 14 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> Z Fn ( N X. M ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_3simpa | |- ( ( N e. U /\ M e. W /\ Z e. V ) -> ( N e. U /\ M e. W ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( N e. U /\ M e. W ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 3, 4, 5, 17 | #P_fnmpt2ovd | |- ( ph -> ( Z = ( a e. N , b e. M |-> B ) <-> A. i e. N A. j e. M ( i Z j ) = A ) ) |
